Key Match Events: Jordan Pickford and England's defense held steadfast to hold on to the lead.
Slovakia almost knotted things up in the first half of extra time with a well-placed cross.
Ivan Toney played a beautiful cross to Harry Kane, who scored to give England a 2-1 lead.
Jude Bellingham scored a bicycle kick in stoppage time to send the match into extra time.
Ivan Schranz scored in the 25th minute to give Slovakia a 1-0 lead.
Pre-Game Insights: England was the No. 9 team in Alexi Lalas' latest power rankings and the lone favorite to win it all at +350.
